# KayGraph Parallel Batch Processing Requirements

# Core dependency
kaygraph>=0.1.0

# No additional dependencies needed!
# KayGraph's ParallelBatchNode uses Python's built-in
# concurrent.futures.ThreadPoolExecutor

# Optional: For enhanced processing
# numpy>=1.20.0         # For numerical operations
# pillow>=9.0.0         # For image processing
# pandas>=1.3.0         # For data analysis
# aiofiles>=0.8.0       # For async file I/O
